sections.heading: False
sections.text:
or deceptive financial statements: Criminal penalty; liability for damages;

removal from office.

sections.heading: Receiving
sections.text:
deposits in insolvent banks with knowledge of insolvency; unfair preference to

creditor; penalty.

sections.heading: Unreasonable
sections.text: delay in responding to offer for sale in lieu of foreclosure.

sections.heading: False
sections.text: oath or affirmation of officer, director, manager or employee; penalty.

sections.heading: Limitation
sections.text: on advertising or publishing statement of stock.

sections.heading: Penalties
sections.text:
for making, aiding in making, or suppressing evidence of false or fraudulent

report.
